description:
Scan Tailor Experimental is an interactive post-processing tool for scanned pages.


fly
- threshold: default value button
- threshold: new adjustment method
- threshold: method Singh (Sauvola threshold with optimization of memory by Singh)
- threshold: method Fox (Wolf threshold with optimization of memory by Singh)
- threshold: Dynamic Window based thresholding method
- threshold: Grad: correct value and adjustment method
- update flatpak info by @plzombie
Build for Debian GNU/Linux by @zvezdochiot .
Build for Windows and Flatpak by @plzombie .
Build for MacOS by @mrfragger and @noobie-iv .
